article.title: Comics shaped healthy marketing, but failed with Scott Adams

result.gist: Comics have historically shaped healthy food marketing, but Scott Adams' Dilbert strip ultimately failed due to his extremist political views and a racist rant.

final.gist: Comics have historically shaped healthy food marketing, but Scott Adams' Dilbert strip ultimately failed due to his extremist political views and a racist rant.

article.title: High drama at Punjab Congress meet as Channi challenges Jat Sikh dominance in party

result.gist: Former Punjab Chief Minister Charanjit Singh Channi publicly criticized the Congress party for its alleged failure to recognize Dalit leaders in key appointments during a recent meeting. This internal dissent highlights a challenge to Jat Sikh dominance within the party.

Former Punjab Chief Minister Charanjit Singh Channi publicly criticized the Congress party for the lack of representation of Dalit leaders in key appointments during a recent meeting, challenging Jat Sikh dominance within the party.

final.gist: Former Punjab Chief Minister Charanjit Singh Channi publicly criticized the Congress party for its alleged failure to recognize Dalit leaders in key appointments during a recent meeting. This internal dissent highlights a challenge to Jat Sikh dominance within the party.

article.title: Infiltration biggest challenge, refugees need not worry: Modi

result.gist: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has identified infiltration as the primary challenge facing the West Bengal government, asserting that refugees should not be concerned. He used this issue to criticize the TMC government, claiming illegal migration has significantly altered the state's demographics.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi criticized the TMC government for infiltration and alleged large-scale illegal migration affecting West Bengal's demographics.

final.gist: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has identified infiltration as the primary challenge facing the West Bengal government, asserting that refugees should not be concerned. He used this issue to criticize the TMC government, claiming illegal migration has significantly altered the state's demographics.
